description: Ready in 20 minutes, this easy lamb rogan josh recipe is perfect for a simple and filling midweek meal.
keywords: Rogan josh,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Seafood free,Wheat free,Rice,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Spinach
name: Simple Lamb Rogan Josh Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 The Spice Tailor Rustic Rogan Josh Meal Kit

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice as per packet instructions.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a medium frying pan over high heat. Add whole spices from meal kit and cook for 20 seconds. Add lamb and sear for 2-3 minutes or until browned. Add base sauce and simmer for 2 minutes. Reduce heat to low and stir in the main sauce, beanettes and spinach and simmer for 2 minutes.
Divide rice among bowls and top with rogan josh and vegetables.
